required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Long-term QoL in Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia Treated With ATO or Standard Chemotherapy
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Quality of Life Symptom Burden in Acute Promyelocytic Leukemia (APL) Patients Treated With Arsenic Trioxide (ATO) or Standard Chemotherapy

brief_summary.textblock: This is a prospective and international observational study run by the GIMEMA. All data will be centrally collected and analyzed at the GIMEMA Data Center in Rome (Italy). Patients reported outcomes will be collected using internationally validated questionnaires.

primary_outcome.measure: To examine cross-sectional long-term differences in health outcomes after treatment end.
primary_outcome.description: Indicated by selected key-QoL outcomes (i.e. Fatigue, Cognitive and Role functioning scales from the EORTC-QLQ-C30 questionnaire), between APL patients treated with ATRA plus chemotherapy versus patients treated with ATRA plus ATO.

secondary_outcome.measure: To examine long-term differences in health outcomes after treatment end indicated by all QoL outcomes not considered in primary objectives, between APL patients treated with ATRA plus chemotherapy versus patients treated with ATRA plus ATO.
To investigate clinical, laboratory, socio-demographic and QoL factors predicting long-term health/QoL outcomes of APL patients after treatment end.
To compare the long-term QoL profile, after treatment end, of APL patients treated with ATRA- chemotherapy and ATRA-ATO with that of their peers in the general population.
secondary_outcome.description: Compared with the general population (without cancer).

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess and compare the cumulative incidence and types of physician-reported late adverse effects (e.g. cardiac function) and secondary cancer, between randomized treatment groups.
secondary_outcome.description: (ATRA plus chemotherapy versus ATRA plus ATO).

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess and compare the prevalence of long-term patient-reported comorbidities and symptoms, after treatment end, between randomized treatment groups.
secondary_outcome.description: (ATRA plus chemotherapy versus ATRA plus ATO).

other_outcome.measure: To assess long-term QoL patterns over time of long-term APL survivors.
other_outcome.description: After treatment end, overall and by treatment group.

arm_group.description: APL survivors previously enrolled in GIMEMA APL0406 clinical trial and in 1st molecular CR after third consolidation treatment.

study_pop.textblock: Patients previously enrolled in a phase III randomized controlled trial that compared the efficacy and toxicity of standard ATRA plus chemotherapy versus ATRA plus ATO in low-intermediate risk APL patients.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- APL survivors enrolled in GIMEMA APL0406 clinical trial and in first molecular CR after third consolidation treatment
- Written informed consent.
Exclusion Criteria:
- APL patients previously enrolled in GIMEMA APL0406 trial who cannot be reached or who are lost to follow-up.
